description: Driving Sustainable Development through Technology & Education. We build and strengthen the ecosystem for sustainable development through enabling changemakers and impact leaders with access to knowledge and innovative solutions. Three core pipelines: Social Innovation, Impact Accelerators, and Circular Economy.
contact_info: Email: collaborate@biji-biji.com; Phone: 603-6419475; Office: Lot 1C-3, Level G1, Publika Shopping Gallery, Solaris Dutamas, Jalan Dutamas 1, Kuala Lumpur 50480
related_news_updates: 433 changemakers nurtured, 57,100 empowered in programs, 138 impact projects created
program_participation: Beyond Bins program (circular economy), Impact Accelerators, Social Innovation programs

description: Creating Innovative Solutions, from the Ground Up. Wild Asia focuses on environmental conservation and sustainable development across Asia.
Technology-focused social enterprise (website currently under development)

Efinity Social Enterprise focuses on providing clean filtered drinking water to rural communities, particularly Orang Asli/Orang Asal communities in Malaysia. They develop and commercialize innovations like the EZ Water Filter Cap. Founded by Teng Yu-Mein, a housewife turned innovator.
contact_info: Email: yumein72@gmail.com; Phone: 013-3377477; Address: 33 Jalan 5/128A Taman Bukit Aman, Kuala Lumpur 58200
related_news_updates: Multiple international award winning innovation, Established in 2016
program_participation: Water access programs for rural communities, Orang Asli empowerment

description: PichaEats is a social enterprise that empowers refugees in Malaysia to generate income as food entrepreneurs. Through training, individuals from the refugee community become skilled home chefs, while PichaEats provides a platform to offer their cuisine to households, events, corporations, and beyond, enabling them to earn a livelihood to support their family.
contact_info: Email: hello@pichaeats.com; Phone: +6012 679 4353 (9am - 6pm); Address: Picha Sdn Bhd (1203033-X) 3-G-7, Complex Cantonment Exchange, 698, Jln Sultan Azlan Shah, Taman Bamboo, 51200 Kuala Lumpur
program_participation: Refugee empowerment program, food entrepreneur training

description: HNSB is a social business company providing catering services and caf√©/canteen operator in Sungai Buloh, Paya Jaras and Klang Valley Region. HNSB serves a wide variety of dishes mainly Malay Cuisines, Cake and Desserts. They help the B40 community out of poverty by providing space for work, practical and business training.
contact_info: Location: Malaysia Petaling Jaya, Selangor; Founded: 2021; Legal Name: HALAMAN NURANI SDN. BHD. (201701030283 (1244453-H))
program_participation: B40 community empowerment, charitable projects and programs
